EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-18-Los Angeles Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-10-17-Los-Angele
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Confirm: Kings vs Canadiens with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning,
I wanted to confirm your registration for this Wednesday’s Los Angeles Community Appreciation Event, hosted by Turbonomic, at Staples Center. We are excited to watch the King’s beat the Canadiens with you!
Please let me know if you will be in attendance by end of day to confirm your ticket. If you have any dietary restrictions please note them in your confirmation email.
To pick up your ticket please find one of our employees in a Turbonomic Polo outside the Figueroa Entrance to the Staples Center between 6:30 and 7:00pm.
General game details are below: <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]> Wednesday, October 18th 7:00pm Where: Staples Center <[[https://www.staplescenter.com/]]> 1111 S. Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90015 Dress Code: Business Attire
I look forward to meeting you,
Murphy Vandervelde
Murphy Vandervelde Sr. Marketing Program Manager - West Turbonomic, Inc.
